pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![Upload Python Package](https://github.com/sendpulse/sendpulse-rest-api-python/workflows/Upload%20Python%20Package/badge.svg?event=release)# sendpulse-rest-apiA simple SendPulse REST client library and example for Python.## Install using pipy```shpip install pysendpulse```## ExamplesSee a list of examples [here](https://github.com/sendpulse/sendpulse-rest-api-python/blob/master/pysendpulse/examples/sendpulse-rest-api-example.py)
